com.pgmacdesign.pgmacutilities.utilities

Class ContactUtilities.ContactQueryAsync

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.pgmacdesign.pgmacutilities.utilities.ContactUtilities.ContactQueryAsync

    public static class ContactUtilities.ContactQueryAsync
extends <any>
    See Javadoc on constructor below

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContactQueryAsync(OnTaskCompleteListener listener, Activity activity, java.lang.String query, java.lang.Integer maxNumResults, ContactUtilities.SearchTypes[] typesToQuery, ContactUtilities.SearchQueryFlags[] queryOptions)
      Perform a contact query on an asynchronous background thread

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContactQueryAsync

        public ContactQueryAsync(OnTaskCompleteListener listener,
                         Activity activity,
                         java.lang.String query,
                         java.lang.Integer maxNumResults,
                         ContactUtilities.SearchTypes[] typesToQuery,
                         ContactUtilities.SearchQueryFlags[] queryOptions)
        Perform a contact query on an asynchronous background thread
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to pass data back on. Note! Data sent back will be a list of Contact Objects. See ContactUtilities.Contact. The data is sent back along the Listener with a tag to match the returned results: Email: PGMacUtilitiesConstants.TAG_CONTACT_QUERY_EMAIL Phone: PGMacUtilitiesConstants.TAG_CONTACT_QUERY_PHONE Name: PGMacUtilitiesConstants.TAG_CONTACT_QUERY_NAME Address: PGMacUtilitiesConstants.TAG_CONTACT_QUERY_ADDRESS
        activity - The activity this is being called from
        query - The query to be included (in String format)
        maxNumResults - The int max number of results. If null or zero is passed, it will simply have no limit on the max number of results.
        typesToQuery - Array of SearchTypes enum objects. These are the types of items to actually make a query to. Sending multiple will return multiple See ContactUtilities.SearchTypes
        queryOptions - An array of SearchQueryFlags that alter how the data is returned. See ContactUtilities.SearchQueryFlags
